item.name: Nobreak Status do Agente
item.description: The status of agent's communication with UPS.

item.name: Tempo Restante da carga da Bateria

valuemap.name: APC Status de Subistituicao da Bateria

item.name: Saída Carga
item.description: The current UPS load expressed in percent of rated capacity.

item.name: Saída Corrente
item.description: The current in amperes drawn by the load on the UPS.

item_prototype.name: Sensor Alarm Status {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The alarm status of the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Sensor Violation Status {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The violation status of the sensor. This integer should be interpreted as a bit map, with each bit representing the presence or absence of the specific alarm conditions listed below. The bit will be '1' if the condition is present, and '0' if the condition is not present

trigger.name: Bateria do Nobreak precisa ser trocada
Capacidade da bateria é insuficiente para a carga do UPS
trigger.description:
Insufficient battery capacity to support the UPS equipment load.
http://networkupstools.org/protocols/snmp/APC-Powernet.pdf

trigger.name: Previsão de término da carga da bateria é menor que 10 minutos
